snippet: Donna Johnson recounts growing up among a traveling caravan of evangelists, holding tent revivals in Southern backwaters, where miracles were in high demand.
lead_paragraph: Donna Johnson recounts growing up among a traveling caravan of evangelists, holding tent revivals in Southern backwaters, where miracles were in high demand.

headline.main: Blind Faith That Is Shaken Under a Revival Tent
headline.print_headline: Blind Faith That Is Shaken Under a Revival Tent
headline.seo: ‘Holy Ghost Girl,’ a Memoir by Donna M. Johnson - Review
